declineAd.name: Reject Ads
declineAd.description: Deny a player's advertisement when policy is violated

acceptReport.name: Accept report
acceptReport.description: Accepts a report and sends the welcome message from 'Report -> Greeting'

cancelReport.name: Exit report
cancelReport.description: Send the farewell from 'Report -> Farewell' and close the report

publicChannel.name: Join Public Channel
publicChannel.description: Moves the player to their own public channel on Teamspeak

aBuy.name: Run ABuy and AEquip
aBuy.description: Automatically buys the set amount when hovering over a buyable/equipable item and pressing this hotkey instead of the left mouse button

screenshot.name: Screenshot with upload to Imgur
screenshot.description: Creates a screenshot, uploads it to Imgur, and copies the link to the clipboard

info.name: Faction Info
info.description: Shows the faction behind the name

color.name: Color
color.description: Color in which faction members are displayed

color.name: Color
color.description: Color in which alliance members are displayed

faction1.name: Alliance faction
faction1.description: Note: must be specified to be able to send D-Chat reinforcements

color.name: Color
color.description: Color used to display Streetwar enemies

houseban.name: House ban
houseban.description: Show players who are banned from the hospital

duty.name: Duty
duty.description: Shows a green dot when the player is on duty

color.name: Color
color.description: Color used to display faction-specific nametags (only for Blacklist and Contract)

corpse.name: Colored Corpse Names
corpse.description: Shows the name of the corpse in the faction colors and adds the faction info at the end

afk.name: AFK and ADMIN SERVICE Info
afk.description: Indicates when a player is AFK or in admin duty

team.name: Addon Team Tag
team.description: Displays the team rank above the name

roleplay.name: Roleplay name
roleplay.description: Displays the roleplay name of other players

screen.name: Screenshot
screen.description: Takes a screenshot when accepting a reinforcement and saves it as a reinforcement activity

equip.name: Equip
equip.description: Sets the equipment prices to provide an equipment list

amount.name: Quantity
amount.description: Amount to be used for personal use

purity.name: Purity
purity.description: Purity to be used for personal use

amount.name: Quantity
amount.description: Amount to be used for personal use

purity.name: Purity
purity.description: Purity to be used for personal use

amount.name: Quantity
amount.description: Amount to be used for personal use

purity.name: Purity
purity.description: Purity to be used for personal use

hq.name: HQ News
hq.description: Formatting the HQ messages into a clearer design

service.name: Service Messages
service.description: Formatting the service messages in a clearer design

dBank.name: D-Bank Messages
dBank.description: Formatting the drug bank messages in a clearer design

contract.name: Contract Messages
contract.description: Formatting the contract messages in a clearer design

filteredContractlist.name: Filtered Contractlist
filteredContractlist.description: Only shows the online targets on the contractlist

greeting.name: Greeting
greeting.description: Message sent when accepting a report

farewell.name: Farewell
farewell.description: Message sent before terminating a report

prefix.name: Prefix
prefix.description: Prefix for the report to enable filtering for a chat window

password.name: Password
password.description: This password is automatically sent to the server when you join the server.

first.name: First command
first.description: Specifies the first command to run after joining the server (e.g. '/mi')

second.name: Second command
second.description: Specifies the second command to run after joining the server (e.g. '/bl')

third.name: Third command
third.description: Specifies the third command to run after joining the server (e.g. '/afk')

hitSound.name: Enable hit sounds
hitSound.description: Enables the hit sounds (Unicacity disables them due to a bug after a rejoin

grouping.name: Group Checkout
grouping.description: Clicking on an ATM executes '/grkasse info'

bombScreenshot.name: Bomb Screenshot
bombScreenshot.description: Automatically creates a screenshot at the end of a bomb

carRoute.name: Automatically display route to car
carRoute.description: After executing the '/car find' command, the route is displayed directly

sorted.name: Sorted Tab List
sorted.description: Sorts the tab list by duty factions, UC's, builders and active reports

afk.name: AFK Tag
afk.description: Shows an icon behind AFK players

despawnTime.name: Despawn Time
despawnTime.description: Displays the despawn time in the karma message after a kill

local.name: Local API connection
local.description: Connects the addon to a local API instance (localhost)
